item.title: Eclipse Kuksa documentation
item.description: Eclipse Kuksa builds a platform to connect vehicles to the cloud and enable the development of specific applications of connected driving. This documentation covers the core pillars as follows: 1. the Eclipse Kuksa IDE, 2. the Eclipse Kukse In-Vehicle Platform, and 3. the Eclipse Kuksa Cloud Platform. This documentation intends to give a high-level overview of the Eclipse Kuksa components. For more detailed information and documentation on the different aspects, we recommend consulting the respective repositories and their Readme files.
